content.question: Which of the following is the work done on the box by the rope as it is pulled from <math alttext="x equals 0" overflow="scroll"> <mi>x</mi> <mo>=</mo> <mn>0</mn> </math> to <math alttext="x equals D" overflow="scroll"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>D</mi></math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="D times the cosine of, open parenthesis, beta D, close parenthesis" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mi>D</mi><mi>cos</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>β</mi><mi>D</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="D times the cosine of, open parenthesis, beta D, close parenthesis, times the cosine of theta" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mi>D</mi><mi>cos</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>β</mi><mi>D</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mi>cos</mi><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi>θ</mi></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="beta times the sine of, open parenthesis, beta D, close parenthesis, times the cosine of theta" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mi>β</mi><mi>sin</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>β</mi><mi>D</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>cos</mi><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi>θ</mi></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction 1 over beta, end fraction times the sine of, open parenthesis, beta D, close parenthesis, times the cosine of theta" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mi>β</mi></mfrac><mi>sin</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>β</mi><mi>D</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>cos</mi><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi>θ</mi></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction 1 over beta, end fraction times the sine of, open parenthesis, beta D, close parenthesis, times the cosine of theta" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mi>β</mi></mfrac><mi>sin</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>β</mi><mi>D</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>cos</mi><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi>θ</mi></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
